¶ For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; Let not your prophets <S%H5030><s%> and your diviners <S%H7080><s%>, that be in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you, deceive <S%H5377><s%> you, neither hearken <S%H8085><s%> to your dreams <S%H2472><s%> which ye cause to be dreamed <S%H2492><s%>.

¶ Because ye have said <S%H559><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath raised us up <S%H6965><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> in Babylon <S%H894><s%>;

¶ Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye therefore the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, all ye of the captivity <S%H1473><s%>, whom I have sent <S%H7971><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>:

¶ Thus shalt thou also speak <S%H559><s%> to Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the Nehelamite <S%H5161><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

For therefore he sent <S%H7971><s%> unto us in Babylon <S%H894><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This <S%H1931><s%> captivity is long <S%H752><s%>: build <S%H1129><s%> ye houses <S%H1004><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in them; and plant <S%H5193><s%> gardens <S%H1593><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of them.

¶ Then came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; Behold, I will punish <S%H6485><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the Nehelamite <S%H5161><s%>, and his seed <S%H2233><s%>: he shall not have a man <S%H376><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>; neither shall he behold <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> that I will do <S%H6213><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; because he hath taught <S%H1696><s%> rebellion <S%H5627><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
